issue.title: [C++] Local filesystem implementation: investigate Windows UNC paths
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5449](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5449). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Followup to ARROW-5378: Windows paths to networked files (e.g. "
server\share\path\file.txt") and extended-length paths (e.g. "
?\c:\some\absolute\path.txt") should be checked for compatibility with the LocalFileSystem implementation.
